title: FS: T206 - SGC graded commons w/OM, PB, EPDG, AB and Tolstoi backs - PRICES REDUCED
author: willworkforT206

posts.post_title: FS: T206 - SGC graded commons w/OM, PB, EPDG, AB and Tolstoi backs - PRICES REDUCED
posts.post_content:
Selling some more of my T206 doubles. I have the following available:
 
Dick Egan, Polar Bear, SGC 40/3, no creases, holder has minor scuffing not visible in scan, now $40 SOLD
Jack Knight (With Bat), El Principe de Gales, SGC 40/3, two creases – top left and bottom right, $55 SOLD
George McQuillan (With Bat), Sweet Caporal 350/30, SGC 60/5, diamond cut, otherwise nice, was $100 now $90
George Stovall (Batting), Old Mill, SGC 40/3, nice corners, not sure why this card is not graded higher, $45 SOLD
Solly Hofman, Polar Bear, SGC 50/4, nice color, no creases, now $55 SOLD
Gabby Street (Catching), Tolstoi, SGC 40/3, no creases, small blemish on back, $75 SOLD
Chief Meyers, Sovereign 460, SGC 40/3, corner crease, minor blemishes, now $60 SOLD
Harry Steinfeldt (With Bat), Polar Bear, SGC 30/2, small chip out of top right corner, otherwise nice, now $25 SOLD
George McQuillan (With Bat), American Beauty (No Frame), SGC 30/2, no creases, rounded corners, $60 SOLD
 
Prices include shipping. Add $2.00 for insurance (at buyer’s option).
 
E-mails committing to purchase take priority over posts. Please e-mail me at [URL="sschris@att.net"]sschris@att.net[/URL] if interested. 
 
Paypal is my preferred method of payment, but other arrangements can be made.
 
PLEASE BE PATIENT WITH E-MAIL RESPONSES/CORRESPONDENCE. I HAVE LIMITED ACCESS TO E-MAIL DURING THE DAYTIME. I WILL REPLY TO ALL E-MAILS. THANKS.
 
Thanks for looking.
 
Steve
